Configuration.Name: L1=12m_L2=1p3m_central_apx10_JM2017
Configuration.SetupScript:
config.wavelength = 5 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 510 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g3' config.apx = -72 config.bs = 3 config.beamcenterx = 92.58 config.beamcenterz = 96.54
config.drive()
